author: abhi18av
body:
Hello Powershell team,

I tried to install powershell on my scaleaway `ARMv8` server on Scaleway by following the instructions on https://www.hanselman.com/blog/InstallingPowerShellCoreOnARaspberryPiPoweredByNETCore.aspx 

I chose the `linux-arm32` binary from the releases page on Github which according to this article should work perfectly fine 
https://www.androidauthority.com/arms-64-bit-architecture-is-good-for-developers-407346/

However, I am stuck at the following error 

```
root@cub:~# /opt/microsoft/powershell/6.1.0/pwsh
-bash: /opt/microsoft/powershell/6.1.0/pwsh: cannot execute binary file: Exec format error 
```

Could you please help me out here ?

comments.author: TylerLeonhardt
comments.body:
Sorry I'm not familiar with this service. What OS are you using here?

My guess is that there may be additional dependencies that need to be installed.

Here are the official Raspian steps:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/scripting/setup/installing-powershell-core-on-linux?view=powershell-6#raspbian

comments.author: abhi18av
comments.body:
Hi @tylerl0706 , here's the service in question 

https://www.scaleway.com/pricing/

I'm using the Ubuntu18.04 image and since the Raspbian and Ubuntu are both debian based, many packages just work.

comments.author: TylerLeonhardt
comments.body:
@abhi18av can you try installing:

libssl1.0.0
libicu60

Via apt? These are the Ubuntu 18.04 dependencies for PowerShell.

comments.author: abhi18av
comments.body:
Yes @tylerl0706 , I tried installing those however it still didn't work that well.

I have since moved away from toying with that idea and have started using the traditional `x86_64` architecture again.

Please feel free to close the issue :)

comments.author: TylerLeonhardt
comments.body: Was it giving you the same error? Out of curiosity

comments.author: abhi18av
comments.body:
Yes,  unfortunately it was.

On Tue, 23 Oct 2018, 01:30 Tyler James Leonhardt, <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Was it giving you the same error? Out of curiosity
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8023#issuecomment-431960586>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AMNNXq61g-PAIWg6lxFnEDgPuH8w8Nhbks5uniPNgaJpZM4XbOiC>
> .
>

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @abhi18av the error indicates the architecture for the executable doesn't match the OS.  Running `file pwsh` should confirm it's the appropriate arch for that platform.

comments.author: abhi18av
comments.body:
I have since tried the latest `arm64` binary for `powershell-6.2.0-preview.3` and it works fine :)

I'll close this issue since the future releases address all these problems.

title: Installation on Ubuntu running on ARMv8 architecture
